title: Traditional Walnut in Natural Finish | Abbey Caskets
description: Handcrafted by Abbey Caskets in St. Meinrad, Indiana. This traditional wooden casket is made of walnut wood with a natural finish and includes a wooden keepsake cross .
cleaned_text: Traditional Walnut in Natural Finish $6,500.00 Excludes Tax The Traditional Walnut Abbey Casket is made of black walnut hardwood. One of the finest lumber species in North America, this dark brown wood is strong with a handsome grain and a rich finish. The Traditional Abbey Casket is fully lined in off-white linen. A solid wood swing bar handle is secured with Venetian bronze hardware on all four sides for ease of carrying. This casket is available for at-need purchases only. Delivery: Shipping & handling by common carrier is included with price of casket. Call for expedited, weekend or holiday delivery charges. Delivery is available 7 days a week.
